sentence: By 2045, most veterans will have served after 9/11

Post- Gulf War
Note: Veterans Affairs categorizes "Post- Gulf War" veterans as peacetime veterans who will
have started serving after the conflicts in Iraq and Afghanistan conclude; they appear in
veteran population projections beginning in 2022. "Other peacetime 97 includes those who
served only during peacetime prior to the gulf wars. Veterans who served in multiple eras are
included in the earliest sera only. Projections are based on estimates of the current veteran
population and active duty military personnel and incorporate estimates of future military
separations. Reservists who did not serve on active duty are not included in these
projections unless they were disabled during training.
Source: U. S Department of Veterans Affairs Veteran Population Projection Model 2016
PEW RESEARCH CENTER
